page.title: 11Where People Work.
page.content: Using our Parents as a sample, we asked them to answer a questionnaire. We found that{85.8%}of our parents go to work. Of these{61.8%}travel to Stockport, Manchester, or further to their job. Although there are three industrial estates within Norbury (Hazel Grove) only{38.2%}work locally. Most people travel to work by car - {69.7%}travelling this way.{75.3%}use either car or train, while{24.7% either walk,cycle or bus to work. Of the ladies sampled{28.3%}are housewives only. Similar questions were asked of people living in a high cost housing area of Poynton. Of 86 households surveyed, it was found that a quarter of the people were retired. Of the remainder,{66.6% worked in Stockport,Manchester or further, and{33.3%}locally.
